title: MHC Interview
Interview Descriptions: Straightforward and simple. I was able to understand my roles and responsibilities that would be expected of me. Enjoyed speaking with the interviewer and learning about their experiences as well.

title: Diet Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at MacNeal Hospital (Berwyn, IL)
Interview Descriptions: Phone interview pretty straight forward. They asked me about my educational experience and a few questions pertaining to nutrition. The hr interviewer was very nice and it took around one hour to complete.

title: Nutrition Clerk Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at MacNeal Hospital (Chicago, IL) in Apr 2021
Interview Descriptions: Very laid back. Had one interview then a follow up call with an offer, but I ended up declining. Seem like nice people, but don't think the job was for me.
Interview Questions: Tell me a little about yourself other than what is on your resume.

title: Housekeeping Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at MacNeal Hospital in Jan 2021
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was easy. The questions were not difficult to answer. It’s more so just talking about your experience if you have any and also if you will be willing to work under some conditions due to COVID.
Interview Questions: How many years experience do you have?

title: Internal Medicine Resident Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at MacNeal Hospital (Chicago, IL) in Nov 2020
Interview Descriptions: Program director a d faculty interview 5 person one time. Very nice to interviewee. Overall was great experience, but I have several red flags. I understand why I was not chose.

title: Pct Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 5 weeks. I interviewed at MacNeal Hospital (Berwyn, IL) in May 2016
Interview Descriptions: I had my interview with my old manager she asked simple questions , but made it seem hard she pretended to be on the computer no eye contact ,so it made it easy for me not to get nervous.
Interview Questions: Where do you see your self in 5 years?

title: Physical Therapist Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at MacNeal Hospital (Berwyn, IL)
Interview Descriptions: Welcoming. Interviewer was not intimidating or abrasive. Didn't ask typical interview questions like describe weaknesses and strengths or describe a situation where you in a conflict and how did you solve the conflict or describe a situation with a patient that was difficult and how did you resolve the difficulty. The interview included peer interview with PTs and PTAs to get a sense of what they like or dislike about the organization.
Interview Questions: What is your philosophy lf treating patients.

title: STaff Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at MacNeal Hospital (Berwyn, IL) in Jun 2015
Interview Descriptions: Applied online. Got called for an interview 2-3 weeks later. Met with clinical coordinator and DON. very nice and eager to hire! Got a call back one hour later with a job offer. Pay is higher than I was offered at any other hospital as a new graduate. I accepted the same day!
Interview Questions: Where do you see yourself in 5 years?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Interview Descriptions: Contacted from manager directly.  Seemed desperate to hire - the unit was extremely short staffed.  Spoke with manager in a free flowing conversation.  Totally not intimidating.  Had an interview with a few nurses from the floor.  They were concerned with how stress is handled and how your overall demeanor is.
Interview Questions: Biggest weaknesses/strengths.  Talk about a mistake you made and what you did.

title: RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at MacNeal Hospital (Berwyn, IL) in Apr 2015
Interview Descriptions: Interviewed with the recruiter. She asked appropriate questions regarding conflict resolution, career path, plans for the future, how is stress handled, what are one's limitations, what are one's strengths and how would I handle a sensitive issue

title: Telecom Attendant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at MacNeal Hospital in Apr 2013
Interview Descriptions: Very quick. I applied on a Monday online and got a call on Thursday. Interviewed Tuesday with the head of the department. She was very nice and easy to speak to. Never felt scared, just maybe a little nervous. I got a call back the following Friday with an offer and I accepted.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work with us?
